list.name: Changes
list.comment:
"Fix missing newline at end of workspace.xml file
Added a newline at the end of the workspace.xml file to follow standard formatting practices. This change helps maintain consistency and prevents potential issues with file handling in certain systems."

task.summary:
Add API integration for blog posts in the home page
Replaced static blog data with dynamic fetching from the API. Introduced new enums, types, and environment variables to support the integration. Updated UI to display real data and added a new backend API route to handle blog fetching.

Filter out 'mail' icon from social links rendering
Updated the social links component to exclude entries with the 'mail' icon. This ensures only relevant external social links are displayed while preserving existing functionality and styling.

Add references to related modules and cleanup misc.xml
Removed unused `.idea/misc.xml` and added module references for backend and frontend projects in `modules.xml`, `vcs.xml`, and `jonathanleivag-v2-backend.iml`. This ensures proper linkage and inclusion of related projects in the IDE.

Add new seed entries for web and blog links
Introduced additional entries for 'web' and 'blog' with corresponding URLs in the seed file. This update ensures that these new links are accessible in the application.

Add 'web' icon support and refine social filters
Added a new 'web' icon to the asset sprite and updated the `IconName` type to include it. Adjusted social components to exclude both 'mail' and 'blog' icons from rendering and ensured consistent code formatting across files.

Add blog icon and exclude web icon from social links
Added a new blog SVG icon to the public assets. Updated the social shared component to filter out icons with type "web" from being displayed.

"Fix missing newline at end of workspace.xml file
Added a newline at the end of the workspace.xml file to follow standard formatting practices. This change helps maintain consistency and prevents potential issues with file handling in certain systems."

Update workspace.xml with formatting and configuration changes
Added a missing newline at the end of workspace.xml for formatting consistency. Updated Git recent branch to "main" and added new entries for HTTP client environments and pull request state. Adjusted task and run configurations to synchronize project settings.

MESSAGE.value:
Add API integration for blog posts in the home page
Replaced static blog data with dynamic fetching from the API. Introduced new enums, types, and environment variables to support the integration. Updated UI to display real data and added a new backend API route to handle blog fetching.

Filter out 'mail' icon from social links rendering
Updated the social links component to exclude entries with the 'mail' icon. This ensures only relevant external social links are displayed while preserving existing functionality and styling.

Add references to related modules and cleanup misc.xml
Removed unused `.idea/misc.xml` and added module references for backend and frontend projects in `modules.xml`, `vcs.xml`, and `jonathanleivag-v2-backend.iml`. This ensures proper linkage and inclusion of related projects in the IDE.

Add new web and blog links to the seed data
Expanded the seed data with two new entries: a web link and a blog link. This update ensures the availability of these links in the application defaults.

Add new seed entries for web and blog links
Introduced additional entries for 'web' and 'blog' with corresponding URLs in the seed file. This update ensures that these new links are accessible in the application.

Add 'web' icon support and refine social filters
Added a new 'web' icon to the asset sprite and updated the `IconName` type to include it. Adjusted social components to exclude both 'mail' and 'blog' icons from rendering and ensured consistent code formatting across files.

Add blog icon and exclude web icon from social links
Added a new blog SVG icon to the public assets. Updated the social shared component to filter out icons with type "web" from being displayed.

Normalize .idea/workspace.xml formatting and resolve conflict
Resolved merge conflict in workspace.xml by normalizing formatting and encoding. Ensured GitHubPullRequestState component changes were integrated correctly.

Update workspace.xml with formatting and configuration changes
Added a missing newline at the end of workspace.xml for formatting consistency. Updated Git recent branch to "main" and added new entries for HTTP client environments and pull request state. Adjusted task and run configurations to synchronize project settings.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Update workspace.xml with formatting and configuration changes
Added a missing newline at the end of workspace.xml for formatting consistency. Updated Git recent branch to "main" and added new entries for HTTP client environments and pull request state. Adjusted task and run configurations to synchronize project settings.
